titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2-Chloro-6-(methylthio)toluene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-Chloro-6-(methylthio)toluene.
